H3.text: where all did picasso live. Málaga

A4.text: Picasso was born at 23:15 on 25 October 1881, in the city of Málaga, Andalusia, in southern Spain.

A5.text: Picasso made his first trip to Paris, then the art capital of Europe, in 1900.

A6.text: Pablo Picasso, Modigliani, and Henri Matisse made Paris their home.
